articles.title: Only slight chance of asteroid Bennu hitting Earth: NASA - TODAYonline
articles.description: WASHINGTON — An asteroid known as Bennu will pass within half the distance of the Earth to the Moon in the year 2135 but the probability of an impact with our planet in the coming centuries is very slight, scientists said on Wednesday (Aug 11).
